Mike Pence said he made the final decision not to run for president Wednesday night. He and his wife told their two daughters and then called their son, who is in college, early Thursday. We just concluded that while we could seek the presidency, we concluded that our best opportunity to continue to serve the people of Indiana was either in Washington, D.C., or here at home, Mike Pence said. . In his remarks, Lomax touched on the critical role education plays in living out Martin Luther King 's dream. "Among the rights Martin Luther King fought for was the right to an education," he said. But his life was tragically cut short before he could lead us in the fight to afford the college education we needed, and the right to attend public schools that would prepare us to gain admission to and graduate from the colleges we had the legal right to attend. That battle he left for us. The breakfast got its start when UNCF and the Colin Powell Mills Foundation joined together to host a community celebration to honor the legacy of Martin Luther King . Fiat, whose brands include Ferrari, Maserati and Alfa Romeo. Volkswagen AG Chairman Ferdinand Piech expressed an interest in buying Alfa Romeo. But Friday, Sergio Marchionne flatly rejected any sale of Alfa Romeo to VW. As long as I'm the CEO of both Fiat and Chrysler, Mr. Ferdinand Piech will never get an offer, Sergio Marchionne said during the J.D. Power event. Sergio Marchionne also said Fiat is looking to "redimension" its joint venture with n automaker Tata Motors to sell Fiat-branded cars in India.
